name: places/ChIJaUBVebtYwokRWHFEdypa7-E
formattedAddress: 249 East 86th St, New York, NY 10028, USA
adrFormatAddress: 249 East 86th St, New York, NY 10028, USA

originalText.text: They see me on time. Very nice staff and thorough. The Ocular Dr is very knowledgeable and knows his stuff. I've been going there and not once have I had an unpleasant experience. Great work guys!!

text.text: They see me on time. Very nice staff and thorough. The Ocular Dr is very knowledgeable and knows his stuff. I've been going there and not once have I had an unpleasant experience. Great work guys!!

originalText.text: I had an appointment with Dr. Ruvio, first of the morning. I was received and checked in as soon as they opened. The doctor was really professional and explained clearly every step during the examination. Top notch. After the visit there was the selling process which is of course the other part of the business. No one wants to overpay something, especially if not needed. The front desk answered all my questions and doubts professionally, without being pushy. From other reviews I had a different experience. Lucky for me, a good one.

text.text: I had an appointment with Dr. Ruvio, first of the morning. I was received and checked in as soon as they opened. The doctor was really professional and explained clearly every step during the examination. Top notch. After the visit there was the selling process which is of course the other part of the business. No one wants to overpay something, especially if not needed. The front desk answered all my questions and doubts professionally, without being pushy. From other reviews I had a different experience. Lucky for me, a good one.

originalText.text:
Dr Ruvio is who I made my appointment with. I arrived Sunday evening and was seen by another provider who did not introduce herself. During the course of my eye exam she made a pretty startling suggestion/diagnosis but did not follow up with a plan of action or who I should seek follow up care with.

When I went to order my glasses, I made it clear to the two sales associates I was not interested in a up-charging on my purchases. The gentleman working, completely disregarded me and kept pushing the blue light filter lens on me. When he finished the older woman who was actually helping me started in with another upgrade.

I understand they have a job to do, but I should not feel like I am at a used car sale and being pressured to spend 100's more than my insurance covers.

To top it off, they could not figure out how to input my order, the gentleman got so flustered he shouted at me to give him 20$ for the copay and he'll figure it out. Dismissing me for the day. I am not sure If I will be getting my glasses in a week or not.

I should have just walked out.

originalText.text: There is a Russian lady highly experienced and is customer orientated excellently; I have made my glasses here many many years; this is the place for excellence and perfect commitment to customers ! I recommend her and the staff; simply excellent üëç!
